title: Potential coconut (Cocos nucifera L.) genotypes for farmers: Evaluation of agronomic traits in a lethal yellowing disease endemic zone in Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Christian Kofi Anthonio, Linda Arhin, Daniel Ansah Fianko, Frederick Leo Sossah, Emmanuel Andoh-Mensah, Ndede Egya Yankey
